summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 22380 entitled: "An ordinance granting to the H. S. Turner Investment Company the right, privilege, and authority to improve the southerly half of East 55th Street from 5th Avenue Northeast to 9th Avenue Northeast, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete sidewalks, together with necessary surface and subdrainage, at its own cost and expense" approved November 8, 1909.
